name: Unbridled Dungeon
description:
Halloween Sale 2020 | Regularly $21.96 Unbridled Dungeon

Explore a huge, randomly generated dungeon world. Defend from monsters and collect treasures. Complete all levels, collect as much gold as possible and curb the world of the dungeon.

How to play?

You need to go from point A to point B, collecting gold and various potions. Potions are divided into four types:

1) Replenishes health.
2) Turns into a knight.
3) Transforms into a dinosaur.
4) Transforms into a magician.

Each character has its own advantage in the game.

Control:

[WASD] - move.
[R] - restart.
[B] - Attack.
[ESC] - exit the game.

Features:

- Endless dungeons.
- Random world generation.
- Management of multiple characters.
- Traps.
- Beautiful pixel graphics.
- Responsive controls.
